content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #72837 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
the code comes from the real world and it's pain for users, hmm P-high or P-medium?
and it'd be great if we had an assignee from the async foundations
Was first assigned P-highby tmandry before they removed it
I think we should keep it, P-high seems appropriate to me

That's a shame, because I was planning to build code with millions of nodes, instead of just a hundred :slight_smile:

More seriously, I think that this use case makes sense, too. Also, I feel that there is no good workaround at the moment.
Could this be a regression prior to 1.43? I think this is worth investigating, I guess we might want to assign P-medium if the regression is older than 1.43?
